name: Hands of Hades
description:
DISCLAIMER: You can get this game straight from Google Play here. I am the developer and I have added it here so you can pay for it if you wish. This is a pay what you want deal too. Thanks for supporting me.

Also, this is an APK file. If you do not know how to install an APK file, check the instructions, or do a search online.

After you have installed it, go to your Play Store app and update Hands of Hades.

- Michael, ding!dev.

Do you have time to waste? Couple of minutes? Why not play Hands of Hades.

In Hands of Hades, your ultimate goal is to collect as many people on earth as you can, but only in short bursts.

------------------

Story

------------------

The Titans have escaped the Underworld and Hades has been called upon by Zeus to salvage all the souls on earth. The player is tasked with salvaging the souls of the people to save them from the eternal damnation which will be cast upon them if they are not saved. You can call upon the help of a variety of creatures from the Underworld to help you. However, sorting the salvaged souls are up to you. You can cause havoc in the underworld and have the creatures do evil for you, or you can have harmony in the underworld and have the creatures do your bidding. Hades, you are needed.
